text: Buggin' with Ruud is a television show of 13 x 60 minutes episodes that follow the adventures of Dutch-New Zealander Ruud Kleinpaste, an entomologist. The series was made by a small team in New Zealand at NHNZ Ltd and is broadcast in the United States on Animal Planet. ==Episodes== ==External links== * Official Site * NHNZ website Category:Animal Planet original programming
title: Buggin' with Ruud
